entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -38.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 10:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -38.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -42.9°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Clear. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
